channel.title: Wildy skull won't go away

item.title: Wildy skull won't go away
item.dc:creator: @o.O_O.o o.O O.o
item.description:
@o.O_O.o wrote:

When you log in in a spot that isn’t wildy, a skull doesn’t show, so there’s nothing wrong there. But regardless of where you log in, when you go into a spot that’s wild, and then come out, the skull won’t disappear. Checkwildy’s :

public void checkwildy() { if (absX >= 3238 && absX <= 3246 && absY <= 3203 && absY >= 3191) { inwildy = true; outStream.createFrame(208); outStream.writeWordBigEndian_dup(197); sendQuest("PK Zone", 199); } else { inwildy = false; } if (absX >= 3246 && absX <= 3251 && absY <= 3208 && absY >= 3196) { inwildy = true; } else { inwildy = false; } } public void checkwildy2() { if (absX >= 3238 && absX <= 3246 && absY <= 3203 && absY >= 3191) { inwildy2 = true; outStream.createFrame(208); outStream.writeWordBigEndian_dup(197); sendQuest("PK Zone", 199); } else { inwildy2 = false; } if (absX >= 3246 && absX <= 3251 && absY <= 3208 && absY >= 3196) { inwildy2 = true; } else { inwildy2 = false; } }

When I took both spots out of inwildy, the same problem appeared. When I took both spots out of inwildy2, the skull didn’t appear.

Thanks.

Read full topic
